articles.author: Stephen Warwick
articles.title: I measured the AirPods Pro 3's heart rate tracking against an Apple Watch Ultra 3 – here's how they compare - TechRadar
articles.description: How Pro are the new AirPods?
articles.content: With the advent of its new AirPods Pro 3 for 2025, there’s a strong argument to be made for their inclusion in Apple’s lineup of fitness wearables alongside the Apple Watch. That’s because, alongside… [+5830 chars]
